instructions:
Tõlgi järgmised atribuudinimed ja -väärtused eesti keelde.

                            Oluline:
                            - Arvesta toote iseloomu ja kogu läbitöödeldud konteksti (pealkiri, kirjeldus, SEO päringud, KKK), et tõlge vastaks toote tegelikele omadustele.
                            - Säilita mõõtühikud õigel kujul (cm, mm, L, W, V jne) ja arvväärtused; kasuta korrektselt eestikeelseid käändeid ja idiomaatilist sõnajärge.
                            - Ära lisa uusi tähendusi ega väärtusi; tõlgi ainult antud nimesid ja väärtusi.
                            - Iga translation-objekt PEAB sisaldama ka "attr_name" välja. Kui kind == "name", siis kasuta attr_name = source.

                            Tagasta täpselt skeemiga { translations: [ { kind: 'name'|'value', source: string, translated: string, attr_name?: string } ] }.
input: {"items": [{"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Product line", "source": "Gorenje Exclusive"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Producer", "source": "Gorenje"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Standardized width (cm)", "source": "60"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Standardized height (cm)", "source": "180"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Energy efficiency class", "source": "E"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Freezer to fridge", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Control", "source": "Internal electronic control"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Annual energy consumption (kWh)", "source": "235"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Net capacity of refrigerator (l)", "source": "176"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Net capacity of freezer (l)", "source": "76"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Metallized rear wall", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Fan", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Air cleaning filter", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Bottle shelf", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Individually adjustable door shelves", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Freezing capacity in 24 hours (kg/24 hours)", "source": "6.0"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Maximum freezer storage time in power failure (hours)", "source": "10"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Type of hinges", "source": "Door on door"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "New Energy efficiency class", "source": "E"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Antibacterial technology"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Antibacterial technology", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Eco mode", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Holiday function", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Telescopic rails of cold drawer"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Telescopic rails of cold drawer", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Freezer freezing temperature", "source": "-14°C - -24°C"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Fully removable drawers and intermediate glass shelves in freezer", "source": "Yes"}]}
